welcomeMessage: Hi **@chauler**, how can I help you?

response.value:
Snippet with error: `` Location of error: Inside the "Featured Videos" section WCAG Guideline violated: 1.2.2 Captions (Prerecorded) Detection Algorithm: Checking if the `iframe` tag has a `track` child element with `kind="captions"` Explanation of Error: The embedded video does not provide captions, which are necessary for deaf or hard-of-hearing individuals to understand the video content. --- Snippet with error: ` View Menu` Location of error: Inside the "Explore Our Menu" section WCAG Guideline violated: 1.4.4 Resize text Detection Algorithm: Checking for deprecated `font` tag Explanation of Error: The `font` tag is deprecated and does not comply with accessibility standards. Text size should be specified using CSS, which allows users to adjust text size as needed. --- Snippet with error: `

Place Your Order

` Location of error: Inside the "Place Your Order" section WCAG Guideline violated: 2.1.1 Keyboard Detection Algorithm: Checking for `onmouseover` event without corresponding `onfocus` event Explanation of Error: The `onmouseover` event requires a mouse, which is not accessible for keyboard-only users. A corresponding `onfocus` event should be provided for keyboard accessibility. --- Snippet with error: `` Location of error: Inside the "Place Your Order" section, in the form WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships Detection Algorithm: Checking for `alt` attribute on `input` element Explanation of Error: The `alt` attribute is not valid for `input` elements. To provide a description for the input field, use the `label` element or the `aria-label` or `aria-labelledby` attributes.

followups.message: What are some best practices for providing captions in embedded videos?

b.description: Ask Copilot or type / for commands

metadata.helpTextPrefix: You can ask me general programming questions, or chat with the following participants which have specialized expertise and can perform actions:
metadata.helpTextVariablesPrefix: You can also help me understand your question by using the following variables to give me extra context:

helpTextPostfix.value:
To have a great conversation, ask me questions as if I was a real programmer:

* **Show me the code** you want to talk about by having the files open and selecting the most important lines.
* **Make refinements** by asking me follow-up questions, adding clarifications, providing errors, etc.
* **Review my suggested code** and tell me about issues or improvements, so I can iterate on it.

You can also ask me questions about your editor selection by [starting an inline chat session](command:inlineChat.start).

Learn more about [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot?tool=vscode&utm_source=editor&utm_medium=chat-panel&utm_campaign=2024q3-em-MSFT-getstarted) in [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/overview).

b.name: GitHub Copilot

parts.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

message.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

response.value:
Snippet with error: `

Welcome to Food Delivery App

` Location of error: Inside the `header` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum) Detection Algorithm: Checking if the contrast ratio between the text color and the background color is at least 4.5:1 for normal text Explanation of Error: The contrast ratio between the white text and the background image may not meet the minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text. This can make the text difficult to read for users with moderate visual impairments. --- Snippet with error: `
Home...
` Location of error: Inside the `nav` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) Detection Algorithm: Checking if the `href` attribute of the `a` tag is set to "#" Explanation of Error: The links in the navigation bar do not have a clear purpose when taken out of context, as they all point to "#". This can be confusing for users who rely on screen readers or other assistive technologies. --- Snippet with error: `` Location of error: Inside the "Place Your Order" section, in the form WCAG Guideline violated: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions Detection Algorithm: Checking if `input` elements have associated `label` elements Explanation of Error: The `input` fields in the form do not have associated `label` elements. This can make it difficult for users with cognitive disabilities to understand what information is required. --- Snippet with error: `

© 2023 Food Delivery App

` Location of error: Inside the `footer` tag WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks Detection Algorithm: Checking if there are mechanisms to bypass repeated blocks of content Explanation of Error: The page does not provide a way to bypass repeated blocks of content, such as the navigation bar or the footer. This can make it difficult for keyboard-only users to navigate the page.

followups.message: What are some best practices for improving accessibility in HTML?
